content: copy reproduce sell and/or distribute this pattern in any form this design and material are copyrighted and protected by federal copyright infringement knit little sea creatures designed by lorraine pistorio i hope you enjoy creating your own little sea creature after completing 4 legs pause to make the claws next place them on the yarn holders facing each other as you did the first 4 legs then complete the last 4 legs and place them on the yarn holders completing the parts in this order will result in them being in the correct order for later beginning the claws… make 2 one right one left leaving long tail cast on 8 sts and join in-the-round… rounds 1-5 k left claw… 6 k2 m1 k1 x 2 k1 m1 x 2 k2 = 12 sts 7 k now that all the legs and claws have been placed in 8 k3 m1 k1 x 3 k1 m1 x 3 k3 = 18 sts the correct order onto the yarn holders you will 9-11 k begin placing the stitches from yarn holder b onto 12 ssk k5 k2tog ssk k5 k2tog = 14 sts the needles 13 ssk k3 k2tog ssk k3 k2tog = 10 sts place the 34 sts from yarn holder b onto the 14-18 k needles right claw… beginning the underside of the crab… 6 k1 m1 x 2 k4 m1 k1 x 2 = 12 sts round 1 cast on 4 sts onto the right needle 7 k then k3 from each of the next 4 legs 8 k1 m1 x 3 k6 m1 k1 x 3 = 18 sts cast on 3 more sts i use the knitted cast-on 9-11 k method here 12 ssk k5 k2tog ssk k5 k2tog = 14 sts then k5 from the right claw 13 ssk k3 k2tog ssk k3 k2tog = 10 sts cast on 6 more sts 14-18 k k5 from the left claw do not bind off cut yarn leaving long tail this tail cast on 3 more sts will be used later to close the opening between the leg k3 from each of the last 4 legs and the claws stuff claw…now at the cast-on edge = 50 sts thread yarn tail onto large-eyed blunt needle insert needle through the outer loops of the 8 cast-on stitches and pull up to gather and secure place the claws onto the yarn holders facing each other with the first four legs remembering to place the last 5 stitches onto yarn holder b 7 inquiries contact rainebodesigns@yahoo com like rainebo designs on facebook http //www facebook com/rainebo-designs-1732403310368724/ ©2017 lorraine pistorio this pattern is not to be sold or given for free to others if you use this pattern to make items for commercial use please give me credit for the pattern please feel free to sell any completed items made from my designed pattern or donate any completed items to charity do not copy reproduce sell and/or distribute this pattern in any
